amendment.description: To protect the right of individuals to bear arms at water resources development projects administered by the Secretary of the Army.

action.text: Amendment SA 805 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 799.

vote.text: Amendment SA 805, under the order of 5/7/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 115.
